td.content: s:pt presents with moderate lower abdominal pain, moderate wheezing associated with food intake, moderate diarrhea and Cancer. he is having symptoms 10 x week, in spite of treatment. patient is a male police office aged 25 Ys. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in his past he does not smoke o:Height 75 in, Weight 124 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Abdomen.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate wheezing associated with food intake, moderate diarrhea. patient also reports of moderate lower abdominal pain. patient is a 25 yo white m police office. o:Height 75 in, Weight 125 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.
